## 0.1.0
* Initial release.
* Basic Sass syntax support. Now supporting nesting and pseudo-classes.

## 0.2.0
* Fixed nesting.
* Variables, comments, '!important' support.
* Added Stringifier.

## 0.3.0
* Refactoring (@sdwvit).
* List/map.
* Loop.
* Move to ES6 syntax (@gucong3000).
* Test cases for `stylelint` (@gucong3000).
* Multiline comments (@gucong3000).
* Interpolation.
